snippet: The director of "Life of Pi" said he finally realized he could make the seemingly unfilmable novel work if it was in 3D. Still, the studio dropped the movie twice.
abstract: The director of "Life of Pi" said he finally realized he could make the seemingly unfilmable novel work if it was in 3D. Still, the studio dropped the movie twice.

headline.main: Ang Lee and the Solution to the Unsolvable
